name: Thalion Silverleaf
personality_traits: Always has their nose in a book, even while walking
Speaks in elaborate words when simple ones would suffice
ideals: Knowledge is the path to power and self-improvement
bonds: My ancient spellbook is my most treasured possession
flaws: Becomes obsessed with magical mysteries, often forgetting basic needs

backstory.early_life: Born during a rare celestial alignment in the ancient forests of Evermeet, Thalion showed an unusual affinity for divination magic from an early age. His parents, both respected scholars, nurtured his talents while teaching him the value of using magic responsibly.
backstory.defining_event: During his studies, he discovered a prophecy about a coming magical catastrophe. This discovery drove him to leave his sheltered life and seek out ways to prevent the foretold disaster.
backstory.recent_history: Now he travels between magical institutions, gathering knowledge and allies while searching for signs of the prophecy's fulfillment.
backstory.goals: To build a network of magical knowledge-sharing between different cultures and prevent the prophesied catastrophe

relationships.mentor: Archmage Elara Moonshadow - Former teacher and confidante
relationships.rival: Vex Darkweave - Competitive fellow student who took a darker path

name: Grom Ironfist
personality_traits: Never backs down from a challenge
Meticulously maintains his weapons and armor
ideals: Duty and honor above all else
bonds: My clan's ancestral hammer must be recovered at any cost
flaws: Takes any slight against his honor as a personal challenge

backstory.early_life: Born into the prestigious Ironfist clan of Hammerfast, Grom was trained in the art of warfare from the moment he could lift a hammer. His family's legacy as defenders of the mountain passes shaped his rigid sense of duty.
backstory.defining_event: During an orc raid, he witnessed the theft of his clan's ancestral warhammer. His failure to prevent this has driven him to prove himself worthy of his family name.
backstory.recent_history: Has spent the last three years tracking down leads about the stolen hammer while serving as a mercenary to fund his quest.
backstory.goals: Recover the Ironfist Hammer and restore his clan's honor

relationships.family: The Ironfist Clan - Prestigious dwarven smiths

name: Lyra Windwhisper
backstory: Growing up in the bustling streets of Waterdeep, Lyra learned to navigate the shadows and use her charm to get what she wants. She now seeks adventure and excitement, often finding herself in trouble but always with a smile.

name: Brom Stonebreaker
backstory: Brom was once a simple farmer, but after a divine vision, he took up the mantle of a cleric. He travels the land, spreading the teachings of his faith and helping those in need, guided by the light of his deity.

name: Zara Nightshade
backstory: Zara made a pact with a mysterious entity from the Shadowfell, granting her dark powers. Now, she walks the line between light and darkness, using her abilities to uncover secrets and seek revenge on those who wronged her.
